titles: A full answer paragraph by paragraph, to Sir John Fenwick's paper given to the sheriffs, January the 28th, 1696/7 at the place of execution on Tower-Hill by a true son of the Church of England, as establish'd by law.
author: True son of the Church of England.
Fenwick, John, Sir, 1645?-1697.
notes: Reproduction of original in Yale University Library.
keywords: Fenwick, John, --  Sir, 1645?-1697. --  True copy of the paper deliver'd by Sir John Fenwicke, baronet, to the sheriffs of London and Middlesex on Tower-Hill, the place of execution, on Thursday, Jan. 28, 1696/7.
